text: aap kah den ki mujhe to apane laabh aur haani ka adhikaar nahin, parantu jo allaah chaahe, (vahee hota hai). yadi main gaib (paroksh) ka gyaan rakhata, to main bahut sa laabh praapt kar leta. main to keval un logon ko saavadhaan karane tatha shubh soochana dene vaala hoon, jo eemaan (vishvaas) rakhate hain
